title: Foundations of Educational Game Design for Children with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of educational technology or game design
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in game-based learning design while considering the cognitive and motor characteristics of children with learning disabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four-stage game-based learning design process: analysis, design, development, and evaluation
Learners can propose three or more game mechanics to improve concentration in children with learning disabilities
Learners can develop prototypes of educational games using digital tools
Learners can design formative assessment tools to verify game effectiveness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
